title: Is this James Earl Jones dressed as Darth Vader?
subtitle: A picture taken at the opening ceremony of "Star Wars" in the United Kingdom is often circulated with the false claim that it documents the laws of racial segregation in the 1970s in London.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A photo showing actor James Earl Jones dressed as Darth Vader along with Star Wars Stars Mark Hamill, Anthony Daniels, and Kenny Baker.
